text: Depending where you live many can't afford to not drive even if they're doing it illegally.

I was having a discussion with someone the other day about a similar situation emotionally. The other person was telling me it's wrong to gloat over others suffering. But there's a difference here, "I agree, I would never gloat. But I *will* take petty satisfaction in watching their failure from a distance." They agreed that that's acceptable.
